review.title: “The Best Fine Gift Store in Northern California”
review.pros: Pros – Direct contact with upper management. Expert co-workers who are very knowledgeable about departments. Fantastic merchandise, the perfect place to find a gift for someone who has everything. Often refreshing displays to keep store current, organized, and updated. Great value on merchandise, especially during the holidays. The company offers free gift wrapping and is the perfect place to finish your gift shopping! Interface often with loyal customers.
review.cons: Cons – Depending on the season, can be under or over staffed.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
